From the brand

WHO WE ARE ?

Mythinglogic was founded in 1999, and is committed to become the most helpful brand in garage storage solution area, aiming to enable an easy garage organizing experience.

WHAT WE DO ?

We offer a wide range of products including all kinds of sports equipment storage racks ,golf storage racks, yoga storage racks as well as tool storage racks.

CLICK TO STORE

CLICK TO STORE

CLICK TO STORE

HOME GYM STORAGE RACK

SPORTS EQUIPMENT STORGE

GOLF GEAR STORGE RACK

GARDEN TOOL RACK

WALL MOUNT SPORTS RACK

SPECIAL DESIGN SPORTS STORAGE ORGANIZER : This sports gear storage stand is an upgraded version for garage storage.It combines a ball storage with golf bag organizer. And it has 4 extra shelves and basket, which can be used to store sports accessories, fitness or tools for your garage.
MULTIFUNCTIONAL STORAGE: This sports rack organizer features with 6 Baseball bat rack,6 movable hanging hooks and 5 bat holder on the side. All those storage accessories can help to store your sports bat , helmet and sports accessories. Make your garage tidy and well organized.
ELASTIC STRAPS DESIGN: This ball rack gets 5 elastic straps. This unique design maximizes storage space of the ball storage bin and allows easier access to the items at the bottom.
HEAVY DUTY STEEL MATERIAL: The ball storage rack is made of high quality steel with powder coated finish and very strong.Since the height is tall and weight is heavy ,for your safety, please install it with screws on the wall.
DIMENSIONS: Overall product size of this sports organizer is 62.0″ L x 13.0″ W x 65.7″ H. And size of the Golf bag stand is 24’’L x 15.7’’W x 48’’H which can hold up to 2 standard golf bags.

It is an attractive, functional storage rack that fits into the garage.And it holds clubs (full bags), and a host of balls, all kind of sports gear, shoes and tools on the five racks. The rack tubing is finished on all ends ,so no jagged ends to scratch things.And the fully assembled unit is very sturdy. And this garage storage shelves is designed for organizing golf equipment and all kind of sports equipment. All-in-one sports storage racks for your garage.

WHAT’S IN PACKAGE:

1 x Sports storage rack

(Assemble required)

1 x Instruction Manual

1 x Some hardware

Read more

PRODUCT DETAILS:

BAT RACK

This sports equipment storage rack features 5 bat holder, can hold baseball bat or Rugby stick or golf stick firmly.

MOVABALE HOOKS

There are some moveable hooks,as you can place any places on sides,so that they create space for hanging lots of different items like coat, hat, lifejacket,bags,sport shoes,etc.

BASEBALL BAT RACK

This sport equipment storage rack equipped with bat rack which can hold 2 baseball rack. Will protect your essential items and lock it firmly in place.

ELASTIC STRAPS

This ball bins gets some elastic straps. This unique design maximizes storage space and allows easier access to the items at the bottom.

Read more

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:38 UTC – Details)

From the brand

YGYQZ: Make your mood neat

Storage shelf or bags bring us simple life

4 styles available

4 styles available

How did we get our start?

When I work in the office, I am often too busy to organize the items on the desktop, so that I spend a lot of time looking for the items I want. This feeling makes me very crazy, so I have designed many products, which tidy up my desktop, what’s more, beautify my office as an office decor.

What makes our products unique?

We have spent a long time conducting research, and combined with numerous customer feedback, we continue to improve and update our products. We have always been in the forefront, and we believe that we do better!

Why do we love what we do?

For efficiency

USPTO certified product

Solely designated patent for YGYQZ

Give your books a home: Is there nowhere to put your books, after a while, the book will fall apart, then your books become crumpled, with this small desktop bookshelf, your books will be able to maintain a new look
Saving desktop space in office: Are you still troubled by the clutter of your desk, using our desktop bookshelf can relieve your problems and make your desk tidy and look comfortable
Lightweight and easy to install: Thanks to the simple design, our desktop small bookshelf can be easily installed and disassembled and can be switched horizontally and vertically, you can decide to let the books lie down or stand at will
Perfect adjustable size: 25.6× 6.7× 15.1 in
Quality assurance: If there is a quality problem with the product,we will give you a refund,no need to return,if there is damage caused by non-human factors within 12 months,we will refund it for free
Since it is a factory direct sale, if there are scratches, please ask for replacement
If parts are missing, please ask for replacement
If there is no installation instruction, you can watch our video or ask us for directions


Cartoon cloud pattern bookshelf


Suitable for your books, pens, etc.

Give your books a place to put them, and you can also store some of your little items, so a simple desktop is no longer boring, and cluttered books are tidy. Providing the most comfortable learning office environment for people.We are committed to creating high-quality cloud pattern bookshelf, each of cloud pattern bookshelf has passed the test of time, you will enjoy a convenient and pleasant shopping experience.

New black cloud bookshelf




black cloud

Save your messy desktop.

black cloud side

Decorate your office or kitchen, everywhere you need to decorate is suitable

black cloud front

Make everything just organized

Read more



High quality cloud pvc board


Rounded design

Rounded corner grinding design, your child won’t get hurt.

You can extend it to make it longer or keep it shorter. It works perfectly on my office desk. Probably going to get one for home bathroom too.

  • Super easy to put together (literally took you about 5 minutes if that)
  • They are sturdy, though they may not look like it at times but i have a lot of heavy books on it so its ganna wobble a bit when they fall against the side. Its perfect for what i need it for.

High quality cloud pvc board

Features

Four patterns of bookshelves to choose

Durable

Simple

Waterproof

Cute

Easy assemble

Durable

Free stretch

  • Materials: PVC board
  • Style: Bear pattern, fawn pattern,white cloud pattern, black cloud pattern
  • Weight: 1.84 kg
  • Color: black, white
  • Size: 25.6× 6.7× 15.1 in
  • Box size: 15.98 x 9.41 x 3.39 in

Read more

High quality buyer’s show





Buyer’s picture1

For decorative tools and small things.

it serves its purpose as a cute shelf on my mom’s kitchen counter. She lives in a tiny space and this helps her to have more counter space for her various kitchen items. Relatively sturdy so far and easy to assemble.

Buyer’s picture2

For toys and dolls.

Easy instructions, I am using it to organize my dresser. Works well as I can adjust length. I haven’t finish organizing it, but it’s holding up my plushies as I finish organizing my closet. Easy to use and very sturdy!

Buyer’s picture3

For pens, plants and cosmetic.

Adorable. Holds my office supplies and cute decorations and doesn’t take up a ton of space on my desk. I love the adjustability of it.

Buyer’s picture4

For something to eat or use.

We wanted something clean looking that wasn’t made of metal. This looks great in our kitchen and there is no signal blockage. Super easy to put together.

Read more


Two colors available

  • Black is noble, white is innocence
  • The two colors match, your house or office will be more stylish

Read more

From the brand

Top Products! Recommend

Hot Products! Recommend

Quadruple Storage Space: The shelf lamp has 5 tiers, and each board allows to put 50 pound max. You can put photo frame, plants, books, or any items on it (ATTENTION: To avoid the lamp fall down, please use the “Torque” to keep steady).
Quality Lampshade with Soft Light: We provide a beautiful lampshade, it makes of high-quality linen. The lighting through the lampshade becomes soft and gentle, which creates a cozy and comfortable atmosphere in the night.
15mins Easy Installation: We provide detailed manual and intallation video. This lamp is easy to install, normally can be finished by one person. The whole lamp decors your living room, bedroom, office or any home corner, its simple and sector design suit for all furnishing style.
addlon’s 3 Year Product Support: We proudly stand behind all of our products 100% and we offer 3 year quality support. Please contact us FIRST in anytime if you have any problem. We are glad to provide help.

Arced Design

This arced design and its soft line makes the lamp more beautiful when it put in the room corner.

Fit Corner Perfectly

90° Make the lamp can be put in the room corner perfectly. The lamp will not occupy too much space.

Pull-chain Switch

The pull-chain is easy to control. The chain is tested to make sure it can work normally after more than ten thousand pull.

3CCT LED Bulb

The package comes with 1 3cct LED bulb, it has 3000K/4500K/6500K for choice. Suit for different scenes.

Product Description

EACHPAI Floating Corner Shelves Wall Mount Set of 4

Enhance any dull corners in your home with our set of 4 rustic floating shelves. Mount the decorative shelves in your living room and display some potted plants, books or collectibles on it. Place storage shelves in your kitchen, and use it to organize your condiments, mason jars, herbs or cooking ingredients. You can even have the hanging shelve in your bathroom, where it will hold your night creams and small towels. Just use your own imagination!

For Bathroom

For Kitchen

For Bedroom

Solid Wood

Made of high-quality paulownia wood, lightweight yet solid with clear texture and the unique handcraft creates a retro style.

Stable Triangular Bracket

The brackets are made of high-quality steel, the triangular design and the elegant matte black finish ensure the shelves stable and fit anywhere in your room.

What’s Included:

4 × wooden boards 8 × triangular metal brackets 20 × big screws 20 × dry wall anchors 20 × small screws 1 × instruction manual

Creative Corner Shelves: Perfect combination of floating and corner shelves.You can make full use of the blank corners and turnings in your room to increase more storage space and make your room neat and organized.
Multifunctional Storage Shelves: Comes with 4 pieces shelves, dimension: 16*11.4inch. Perfect for displaying and holding collectibles, small plants, photo frames, books, etc. Can be used in bedroom, living room, bathroom, kitchen, office and more.
Easy to Install: All the needed tools and detailed intallation guide are in the package, just follow the simple instruction to install the hanging shelves in a few minutes. Any questions or problems, just contact us via Amazon and we always get your back.
Sturdy Wood Shelves: Made of high quality paulownia wood, these shelves are lightweight yet sturdy enough to hold your favorite items. They won’t add too much burden to the wall but per shelf has a max load-bearing capacity of 40lbs.
Rustic Wall Shelves: Torched wood finish and curve design for board and matte finish metal bracket features a carbonized black accent, which will be a great rustic addition to your wall.

EACHPAI Floating Corner Shelves Wall Mount Set of 4

Enhance any dull corners in your home with our set of 4 rustic floating shelves. Mount the decorative shelves in your living room and display some potted plants, books or collectibles on it. Place storage shelves in your kitchen, and use it to organize your condiments, mason jars, herbs or cooking ingredients. You can even have the hanging shelve in your bathroom, where it will hold your night creams and small towels. Just use your own imagination!

For Bathroom

For Kitchen

For Bedroom
